TopicTitle: Rocket TWR dropped from 3.36 to .94 after quitting game

Articles.Content:
TLDR: Rocket TWR dropped from 3.36 on pad to .94 after logging off for the night

I made a rocket last night and launched with a TWR of 3.36. I had no problems with it and got it into orbit. I made a save on the pad just in case something went wrong, but when I got into orbit I quit the game and went to bed. The next morning I logged on to see that I launched at a not very optimal transfer window, and reverted to the pad and waited a couple (hundred) days and launched again to find that the same craft suddenly has a TWR of .94 I changed nothing with the craft and inspected it to find it exactly the same, and luckily I was recording the initial launch so I looked over the footage and found everything to be alright. I have no idea what is going on here, but the icing on the cake is that KER says that it would have a TWR of 1.12 in the VAB, but it just decreases. Did I encounter a bug or something?

1 minute ago, linuxgurugamer said:

Check your throttle

Main engine was throttled down, dont know how that happened.
